about_the_game:
Redneck Brawl Turbo is a casual auto shooter that unfolds in a quirky world, drawing inspiration from 1980s martial arts comedy movies. Play as a guy who must save his village. Fight waves of wacky enemies. Earn coins and spend them on lessons from the Kung Fu Master, Drunken Master, and White Ninja.

 

BECOME A LEGEND

You are Pal, the strongest guy in the village, chasing down ninjas who stole the Statue of Prosperity. Explore wild jungles, shady slums, scorching deserts, and more, battling hordes of enemies like punks, convicts, robots, and even aliens.

 

MEET THE MASTERS

● Kung Fu Master: Master the art of ki energy and learn how to transform it into devastating weapons.

● Drunken Master: Unorthodox but effective, this mentor will teach you creative combat tactics using destructive gadgets.

● White Ninja: With a sharp mind honed by solving Rubik’s cubes, he teaches you lifehacks like reanimating yourself with a car battery and many others.

HUMOR

The game’s charm lies not only in its dynamic gameplay but also in its humor. From funny stories to ridiculous descriptions, this game delivers humor in every corner.

 

GET STRONG

Pump iron, run laps, and become a force to be reckoned with.

 

BUDDIES

Visit the village tavern where your friends gather. Treat a buddy to a mug of frothy drink, and they’ll gladly embark on a mission in your place. Each buddy has unique quirks or skills.

 

ENTERTAINMENT

There’s plenty to do in the village tavern:

● Fishing pond. Catch and collect 43 species of fish.

● Treasure chest. Unlock treasure chests with your lock-picking skills.

● Wheel of Fortune. Try your luck and win valuable prizes.

 

KEY FEATURES

● Hand-Crafted Art: Every level, character, and ability is hand-drawn, creating a truly unique visual experience.

● Fluid Animations: Hundreds of meticulously crafted skeletal animations guarantee smooth and crisp movements, even in slow motion.

● Customizable Abilities: Mix or Match techniques of Kung Fu Master: Combine 45 abilities or match them to create 15 super abilities. Make powerful customized builds for a specific situations.

● Destructive Gadgets: Utilize 12 unique devices from the Drunken Master, each with different situational advantages.

● Diverse Enemies: Face off against 98 unique foes, including snowmen, ninjas, grannies, gangsters, maniacs, robots, aliens, and more.

● Formidable Bosses: Conquer 35 unique bosses, from the Skeleton and Punk to the Dragon, Doctor, Super Soldier, Alien Mothership, and Terminator T-300.

● Vibrant Levels: Explore 13 unique locations, including wild jungles, criminal slums, arctic tundras, robotic factories, and exotic deserts.

● Challenging Missions: Complete 195 missions to earn ki energy and trophies.

 

Are you ready to join Pal on his epic quest? The village’s fate is in your hands!

name: Redneck Brawl Turbo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel 2.0ghz Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel 2.0ghz Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Redneck Brawl Turbo is a casual auto shooter that unfolds in a quirky world, drawing inspiration from 1980s martial arts comedy movies. Play as a guy who must save his village. Fight waves of wacky enemies. Earn coins and spend them on lessons from the Kung Fu Master, Drunken Master, and Ninja.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
